name: Cookies: Happily Baked Adventure
description:
Made in less than 72h for the Mini Jam 94: Baking, this short silly game takes you on an epic adventure with Mr. Big Mustache Cookie Sir who needs to protect his fellow Happily Baked Cookies and their Bakery! 

Been learning to make games, and programming in general, for less than a month so far, so don't expect too much from the game. Always up for constructive criticism! Very happy to be a part of the Jam!

Hope you enjoy the game!
